content: > this pattern is available for ** free > on my blog here 1 ** the > downloadable pdf listed for sale > contains the full pattern including > important notes stitch guide written > instructions and photo-tutorial in > one printable file without > advertisements learn fantastic brioche crochet technique with brioche infinity pillow and don t be afraid of intricate patterns the pattern is available in english us terms and dutch **level ** intermediate **size ** the square is infinity and can be done in any size **materials ** scheepjes stone washed 78% cotton x 22% acrylic 50g/ 130m/ 142yrds **yarn a ** 801 moon stone x 3 skeins **yarn b ** ~ 811 deep amethyst x 1 skein ~ 804 boulder opal x 1 skein ~ 812 lemon quartz x 1 skein 4 g mm crochet hook tapestry needle ready-made fabric pillowcase 1 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/06/brioche-infinity-pillow html
